item.title: Stream Twitter Statuses with Tweepy
item.description: Flashback to several years ago when I was using Twitter and learn text mining. At that time, I used python to collects twitter statuses with specific keywords / terms defined and then stored all of those statuses to csv as dataset for text mining learning. In this article, I will share how to stream twitter statuses with python using tweepy module but in this article, I only print the status without store it to a file or database.
